commits: 58c3b3f: fix(#288): add isFreeInputMode flag to prevent selector re-display during custom command input
message: TDD implementation complete. Added isFreeInputMode flag to MessageInput component to prevent command selector from re-displaying during custom command input. Coverage 89.36% on MessageInput.tsx (target 80%). All 18 tests pass including 7 new test cases (TC-1 through TC-7). Zero ESLint and TypeScript errors.
